content: Is there a rough schedule or order for tracks to provide highlights that starts at 1:00pm CST?

@Forrest White you can find the document to schedule your time in confluence. It is called Track Highlights, and is located in the track lead check list section as number 4. Please let me know if you cannot find it.

Forrest White said:

Is there a rough schedule or order for tracks to provide highlights that starts at 1:00pm CST?

Hi Forrest - the schedule is listed in the session description in Whova. There are still some track leads signing up so it may change slightly... https://whova.com/portal/webapp/conne_202201/Agenda/2117145
